6.sentence: France is in a different situation than Canada because instead of integrating newcomers, they ghettoize them. The key dfference is that Canada has very robust institutions and organizations to support integration and a critical mass of relatively recent immigrants to mute the feelings of alienation. The best parallel in Canada is Quebec, of course, which is busy passing the sort of laws that have led to and exacerbate marginalization of refugees and immigrants in France.
